activities: iTechTool provides products and services which enable wireless communications with mobile workers, clients and partners.  The iTechTool network facilitates the delivery of wireless messages to carriers and or devices.  The wireless messages are kept for a period of 24 hours or less for purposes of delivery only.  Access to wireless messages is strictly limited to need to know personel only with stringent firewall and security measures.  Minimal information including the recipient device number, date of message and other relevant message statistics are kept for billing purposes; this billing information is strictly limited to need to know personel only with stringent firewall and security measures.  iTechTool does not keep any data related to human resources.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities
